Activate 1 Interact

Ripples move constantly through a roaring potion, a cloudy liquid that growls when you open its container. Drinking it gives you access to two other activations for 1 hour.

Activate 1 envision

Effect You gain the effects of a 7th-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Bullhorn] spell. You can Dismiss the activation.

Activate 1 envision

Frequency once every [[/r 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}

Effect You emit a scream in a @Template[type:cone|distance:15] that deals @Damage[10d4[sonic]|traits:area-damage]. Each creature in the area can attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:38] saving throw.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half damage.

Failure The creature takes full damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 1}.

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 2}.
